text: Preachin' Cowboy: The Benefits of Godly Living (Video) Preachin’ Cowboy: The Benefits of Godly Living Truth Talk America Network provides shows based in faith, truth, family, and life. TTA also curates and streams documentaries from various creators for viewers to watch and share with others that has been mainly censored on mainstream platforms. B.L.U.N.T. is an acronym which stands for ‘Believers Living Under New Covenant Truths.’ 8am – 8:30 am EST ‘B.L.U.N.T. Teachings with The Preachin’ Cowboy’ airs weekdays @ 7a CST/8a EST on Truth Talk America Rumble Channel, The Truth Talk America Network, Boxcast.tv for ROKU, Apple+, and Amazon Fire TV. [B.L.U.N.T.
